Global insurance regulations are evolving fast, bringing both opportunity and risk. International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) 17 reshapes how insurers value liabilities and recognize profit, while Solvency II updates aim to unlock capital for long-term investment. Karthik Balasubramanian explains how carriers, regulators, and tech players are coming together to ensure these changes drive transparency, stability, and comparability across the ecosystem. Watch the video to learn how the industry is adapting

#IndustryFirstWithAI #AIFirstForInsurance #GlobalEconomicRisksNavigator

This #LoveATreeDay, Infosys expresses a heartfelt gratitude to them and reaffirms its deep-rooted commitment to environmental stewardship.
